branchCategory.name: JSY
branchCategory.description: <p>JSY series is a 5-port directional control valve targeted for the robotic arms and end of arm tools.&nbsp; It has compact and lightweight design while improving its flow characteristics.&nbsp; JSY series is available as plug-in and non plug-in types.&nbsp; There are 3 valve body sizes available for JSY series, JSY1000 (6.4mm), JSY3000 (10mm) and JSY5000 (15mm).&nbsp; JSY1000 is the world's smallest width 5 port valve with body width of 6.4mm.&nbsp; JSY plug-in type is compatible with fieldbus and ethernet communication module such as EX600 and EX260.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Plug-in
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in type for JSY series is available in 3 valve body sizes, JSY1000 (6.4mm), JSY3000 (10mm) and JSY5000 (15mm).  JSY plug-in type is compatible with fieldbus, ethernet and wireless communication module such as EX600 and EX260.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Non Plug-in
branchItem.description: <p>Non plug-in type for JSY series is available in 3 valve body sizes, JSY1000 (6.4mm), JSY3000 (10mm) and JSY5000 (15mm).  It is available in side porting and bottom porting.  Non plug-in JSY is also available in dual 3-port configuration.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold Options
JSY Tube Releasing Tool
